short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Your Garmin Connect Web Experience
short.zh_CN: 增强 Garmin Connect Web 体验

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## GCW Enhancement

It's a Chrome Extension to enhance your experience in [GCW(Garmin Connect Web)](https://connect.garmin.com/modern/newsfeed). Currently, these features are supported.

- [x] Import and Export your workout as json files.
- [ ] Import and Export your workout as short links.
- [ ] Download workouts in bulk.

## FAQ

### How to tell the content added by this extension？

The content added by this extension will contain an arrow icon ahead.
long.zh_CN:
## GCW Enhancement

这是一个用于增强您在[GCW（Garmin Connect Web）](https://connect.garmin.cn/modern/newsfeed)上体验的 Chrome 插件。目前，支持以下功能：

- [x] 导入和导出您的训练数据为 json 文件。
- [ ] 导入和导出您的训练数据为短链接。
- [ ] 批量下载训练数据。

## 常见问题解答

### 如何识别这个插件添加的内容？

这个插件添加的内容前面会有一个箭头图标
